editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.

ios.subtitle: The night and low light camera

editorialNotes.short: A perfect app for taking pictures in low-light environments.

editorialNotes.standard: The start of golden hour is no longer a guessing game thanks to Lumy. This simple but elegant tool helps maximize your time, tracking information for sunrise, sunset, and more across all your devices.
editorialNotes.short: Find the best time for taking the perfect shot.

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everything’s accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.
Digital photography has never looked so analog.

editorialNotes.standard: Create professional-looking photos with minimal effort, thanks to Camera+’s excellent manual controls for shooting, plus dozens of filters, frames, and tweaks to help perfect each shot. From adjusting your workflow to syncing your pictures to iCloud, Camera+’s features have been meticulously crafted, refined, and innovated throughout the years.

Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesn’t mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Camera’s grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. It’s not just about old-school kicks, though—this powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
editorialNotes.short: The easy way to create authentic vintage movies.
